settings.title: THE BEGINNING
settings.content: Most craft chocolate bars are made with premium cacao + refined sugar. With a passion towards all things health & wellness as well as being a lifelong chocolate fanatic, our founder was determined to bridge the gap and bring these two worlds together in order to deliver the world's best tasting chocolate that’s actually good for you!

custom_css: .h2 {font-family: "Fjalla One"; font-size: 40px; font-weight: 400; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #3b2d22; opacity: 0.6; text-transform: uppercase;}

settings.title: CHALLENGE ACCEPTED
settings.content: We decided to take two of the most delicious superfoods on the planet (cacao +dates) and aim for the stars. After endless months of trial & error and quite literally leaving no stone unturned, with the help of our genius chocolatier (“The Real Willy Wonka”), our vision became a reality, the code was cracked & The Conscious Bar was born.

custom_css: .h2 {font-family: "Fjalla One"; font-size: 40px; font-weight: 400; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #3b2d22; opacity: 0.6; text-transform: uppercase;}

settings.title: A NEW WORLD OF CHOCOLATE:
settings.content:
We take the utmost pride in introducing an innovative approach to craft chocolate that is truly like nothing else on the market: Rich, creamy, bold, sweet, nutty & absolutely guilt free. Our hope is that you enjoy our chocolate as much as we enjoyed creating it. 
Indulge freely!
